markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
# Unix Commands

> Don't be afraid of the terminal!

## Files

### Creating a File

```
touch file.py
```

### Moving a File

```
mv file.py another/folder
```

### Deleting a File

```
rm file.py
```

### Contents of a File

```
cat file.py
```

### Editing a File

```
nano file.py
```

or if you are particularly brave:

```
vi file.py
```

## Folders

### Creating a Folder

```
mkdir folder
```

### Contents of a Folder

```
ls folder
```

### Deleting a Folder

```
rm -rf folder
```

Unix Commands

Don't be afraid of the terminal!

Files

Creating a File

touch file.py

Moving a File

Deleting a File

Contents of a File

Editing a File

or if you are particularly brave:

Folders

Creating a Folder

Contents of a Folder

Deleting a Folder
